sentences.en: A guide gives a brief talk on the history of the site.
sentences.cn: 导游简要地介绍了那个遗址的历史。

sentences.en: But this site is definitely worth bookmarking.
sentences.cn: 但这个网址肯定值得放进书签里。

sentences.en: Developers are now proposing to build a hotel on the site.
sentences.cn: 开发商现在建议在这个地方盖一座宾馆。

sentences.en: He said chemical weapons had never been sited in Germany.
sentences.cn: 他说从未在德国部署过化学武器。

sentences.en: Houston was chosen as the site for the convention.
sentences.cn: 休斯敦被选作大会的会址。

sentences.en: It arrives as a flat pack and is bolted together on site.
sentences.cn: 送到时是一套盒装组合家具，再就地装配起来。

sentences.en: Its headquarters will soon be relocated from Westminster to the Greenwich site.
sentences.cn: 其总部很快将从威斯敏斯特迁往格林尼治。

sentences.en: More bodies have been dug up at the site.
sentences.cn: 在那个地点又挖掘出几具尸体。

sentences.en: Only a skeleton staff remains to show anyone interested around the site.
sentences.cn: 只有一小部分必需的工作人员留在那里，带有兴趣的人参观遗址。

sentences.en: Rue Guynemer begins at the front of the Fitzgerald site.
sentences.cn: 吉内梅街始于菲茨拉德故居前。

sentences.en: Stimulate the site of greatest pain with a small negative current.
sentences.cn: 以微弱负电流刺激疼得最厉害的部位。

sentences.en: The school occupies split-site accommodation on the main campus.
sentences.cn: 该学院分散在主校区不同地点。

sentences.en: The site has been out of use for many years.
sentences.cn: 这个地方已经闲置多年。

sentences.en: This site remained undiscovered, though long sought, until recent times.
sentences.cn: 虽经长期寻找，但该遗址直到最近才被发现。

sentences.en: Three CBS cameramen were on site to shoot and edit taped reports.
sentences.cn: 3名哥伦比亚广播公司的摄影记者在现场拍摄并编辑录像报道。

sentences.en: You can also tour the site on modern coaches equipped with videos.
sentences.cn: 您也可以乘坐配有视频设备的现代化长途汽车游览那处遗址。

to place or build something in a particular place
